CompareExpression<T>.description:
A CEL expression that evaluates to boolean true or false based on a comparison
between the value of another expression and a literal of that same type.

HttpsOptions.description: Options that can be set on an onRequest HTTPS function.

concurrency.description: Number of requests a function can serve at once.

cors.description:
If true, allows CORS on requests to this function.
If this is a `string` or `RegExp`, allows requests from domains that match the provided value.
If this is an `Array`, allows requests from domains matching at least one entry of the array.
Defaults to true for {@link https.CallableFunction} and false otherwise.

cpu.description: Fractional number of CPUs to allocate to a function.

enforceAppCheck.description: Determines whether Firebase AppCheck is enforced. Defaults to false.

ingressSettings.description: Ingress settings which control where this function can be called from.

invoker.description: Invoker to set access control on https functions.

labels.description: User labels to set on the function.

maxInstances.description: Max number of instances to be running in parallel.

memory.description: Amount of memory to allocate to a function.

minInstances.description: Min number of actual instances to be running at a given time.

omit.description: If true, do not deploy or emulate this function.

preserveExternalChanges.description: Controls whether function configuration modified outside of function source is preserved. Defaults to false.

region.description: HTTP functions can override global options and can specify multiple regions to deploy to.

serviceAccount.description: Specific service account for the function to run as.

timeoutSeconds.description:
Timeout for the function in sections, possible values are 0 to 540.
HTTPS functions can specify a higher timeout.

vpcConnector.description: Connect cloud function to specified VPC connector.

Param<T>.description:
Represents a parametrized value that will be read from .env files if present,
or prompted for by the CLI if missing. Instantiate these with the defineX
methods exported by the firebase-functions/params namespace.

ParamOptions<T>.description: Configuration options which can be used to customize the prompting behavior of a Param.

default.description: An optional default value to be used while prompting for input. Can be a literal or another parametrized expression.

description.description: An optional long-form description of the Param to be displayed while prompting.

input.description: The way in which the Firebase CLI will prompt for the value of this Param. Defaults to a TextInput.

label.description: An optional human-readable string to be used as a replacement for the Param's name when prompting.

ResetValue.description: Special configuration type to reset configuration to platform default.

ResourceInput.description:
Specifies that a Param's value should be determined by having the user
select from a list containing all the project's resources of a certain
type. Currently, only type:"storage.googleapis.com/Bucket" is supported.

SecretParam.description:
A parametrized string whose value is stored in Cloud Secret Manager
instead of the local filesystem. Supply instances of SecretParams to
the secrets array while defining a Function to make their values accessible
during execution of that Function.

SelectInput<T>.description:
Specifies that a Param's value should be determined by having the user select
from a list of pre-canned options interactively at deploy-time.

SelectOptions<T>.description:
One of the options provided to a SelectInput, containing a value and
optionally a human-readable label to display in the selection interface.

TernaryExpression<T>.description: A CEL expression corresponding to a ternary operator, e.g {{ cond ? ifTrue : ifFalse }}

TextInput<T>.description:
Specifies that a Param's value should be determined by prompting the user
to type it in interactively at deploy-time. Input that does not match the
provided validationRegex, if present, will be retried.

validationErrorMessage.description:
A custom error message to display when retrying the prompt based on input
failing to conform to the validationRegex,

validationRegex.description:
A regular expression (or an escaped string to compile into a regular
expression) which the prompted text must satisfy; the prompt will retry
until input matching the regex is provided.

frameworksBackend.description: Options that can be set on an onRequest HTTPS function.
Options that can be set on an onRequest HTTPS function.
Options that can be set on an onRequest HTTPS function.
